message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $175. I think it's a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $120 for it. Looking forward to your response!

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $120 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $140.  This is still a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.

Hello Alice, I've looked into the market and found similar products at lower prices. Based on my research, I believe we can agree on a price of $130 for this product. I hope you'll consider this offer.
